data.text: Adamadi natɛ tongoma a bɔɲɛ kui,
Adama tan bɛ, a xa kira birin fan,
Wali birin taxu Alatala ra, alako a xa sɔɔnɛya.
Alatala fe birin yailanxi fe nde nan ma.
Alatala yɛtɛ igboe xɔnxi.
Yunubi xafarima hinnɛ nun dugutɛgɛya nan saabui ra.
Mixi ɲɛrɛ ki na rafan Alatala ma,
Se dondoronti sɔtɔxi tinxinyi ra
Mixi natɛ tongoma a xa fe rabaxi ma,
Mangɛ xa masenyi tide gbo,
Alatala na sikeeli tinxinxi nan bɛ,
Fe ɲaaxi mu rafan mangɛe ma,
Mangɛe xa hinnɛ na tinxintɔɛe bɛ,
Mangɛ xa bɔɲɛte mixi faxama nɛ,
Mangɛ xa ɲɛlɛxinyi findima simaya nan na,
Lɔnni sɔtɔɛ fan xɛɛma sɔtɔɛ bɛ,
Tinxintɔɛ xa kira mu sigama fe ɲaaxi ma.
Yɛtɛ igboɲa mixi nan xun nakanama,
Lufe yɛtɛ magoree ya ma, na fan
Hɛɛri na mixi bɛ naxan a ɲɛngi sama fe raba kie xɔn ma.
Mixi sabarixi findima xaxilima nan na.
Xaxili fanyi simaya nan fima xaxilima ma,
Xaxilima a ɲɛngi sama a xa masenyi ma,
Wɔyɛn fanyi findixi kumi nan na,
Adama a maɲɔxun nɛ a xa kira fanxi,
Walikɛ xa kaamɛ nan a tutunma wali ma.
Fuyante fe ɲaaxi maɲɔxunma nɛ,
Mixi kobi gere xɔrɛ isɔxɔma nɛ,
Mixi kobi a boore ratantanma nɛ,
Mixi naxan tɔnxuma masenma a ya nun a dɛ ra,
Xunsɛxɛ fiixɛ findima binyɛ nan na,
Diɲɛ mixi fan geresoe bɛ,
Mixi kanda bunma fe nde ma,
